quote: Get busy living, or get busy dying.
author: Andy Dufresne (The Shawshank Redemption)

quote: Hope is a good thing, maybe the best of things, and no good thing ever dies.
author: Andy Dufresne (The Shawshank Redemption)

quote: It’s not who I am underneath, but what I do that defines me.
author: Batman (Batman Begins)

quote: Why do we fall, sir? So that we can learn to pick ourselves up.
author: Alfred Pennyworth (Batman Begins)

quote: A hero can be anyone, even a man doing something as simple as putting a coat around a young boy’s shoulders.
author: Batman (The Dark Knight Rises)

quote: Do, or do not. There is no try.
author: Yoda (Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back)

quote: Your focus determines your reality.
author: Qui-Gon Jinn (Star Wars: The Phantom Menace)

quote: The Force will be with you. Always.
author: Obi-Wan Kenobi (Star Wars: A New Hope)

quote: Great men are not born great, they grow great.
author: Vito Corleone (The Godfather)

quote: Every man dies, not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace (Braveheart)

quote: They may take our lives, but they’ll never take our freedom!
author: William Wallace (Braveheart)

quote: Life is not the amount of breaths you take, it’s the moments that take your breath away.
author: Hitch (Hitch)

quote: It’s what you do right now that makes a difference.
author: Black Hawk Down (Hoot)

quote: You have to do everything you can, and if you stay positive, you have a shot at a silver lining.
author: Pat (Silver Linings Playbook)

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: Albus Dumbledore (Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban)

quote: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are… it is our choices.
author: Albus Dumbledore (Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets)

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Mr. Anderson (The Perks of Being a Wallflower)

quote: You is kind. You is smart. You is important.
author: Aibileen Clark (The Help)

quote: Oh yes, the past can hurt. But you can either run from it, or learn from it.
author: Rafiki (The Lion King)

quote: What we do in life echoes in eternity.
author: Maximus (Gladiator)

quote: Strength and honor.
author: Maximus (Gladiator)

quote: At some point, you’ve got to decide for yourself who you’re gonna be. Can’t let nobody make that decision for you.
author: Juan (Moonlight)

quote: Just keep swimming.
author: Dory (Finding Nemo)

quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the most rare and beautiful of all.
author: The Emperor (Mulan)

quote: Courage is not the absence of fear, but rather the judgment that something else is more important than fear.
author: Ambrose Redmoon (as quoted in The Princess Diaries)

quote: It’s only after we’ve lost everything that we’re free to do anything.
author: Tyler Durden (Fight Club)

quote: Our lives are defined by opportunities, even the ones we miss.
author: Benjamin Button (The Curious Case of Benjamin Button)

quote: You’re braver than you believe, stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: Christopher Robin (Winnie the Pooh)

quote: To infinity and beyond!
author: Buzz Lightyear (Toy Story)

quote: After a while, you learn to ignore the names people call you and just trust who you are.
author: Shrek (Shrek)

quote: Carpe diem. Seize the day, boys. Make your lives extraordinary.
author: John Keating (Dead Poets Society)

quote: No matter what anybody tells you, words and ideas can change the world.
author: John Keating (Dead Poets Society)

quote: Don’t ever let somebody tell you you can’t do something. You got a dream, you gotta protect it.
author: Chris Gardner (The Pursuit of Happyness)

quote: If you want something, go get it. Period.
author: Chris Gardner (The Pursuit of Happyness)

quote: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
author: Maid Marian (The Princess Diaries)

quote: Sometimes it is the people who no one imagines anything of who do the things that no one can imagine.
author: Alan Turing (The Imitation Game)

quote: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.
author: Red (The Shawshank Redemption)

quote: It’s supposed to be hard. If it were easy, everyone would do it.
author: Jimmy Dugan (A League of Their Own)

quote: There’s no crying in baseball!
author: Jimmy Dugan (A League of Their Own)

quote: You’re never out of the fight.
author: Marcus Luttrell (Lone Survivor)

quote: Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
author: Tony Stark (Iron Man)

quote: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
author: Thomas Edison (as quoted in National Treasure)

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself.
author: Jordan Belfort (The Wolf of Wall Street)

quote: Without pain, without sacrifice, we would have nothing.
author: Tyler Durden (Fight Club)

quote: The night is darkest just before the dawn. And I promise you, the dawn is coming.
author: Harvey Dent (The Dark Knight)

quote: Why are you trying so hard to fit in when you were born to stand out?
author: What a Girl Wants (Daphne Reynolds)

quote: To see the world, things dangerous to come to, to see behind walls, draw closer, to find each other, and to feel. That is the purpose of life.
author: Walter Mitty (The Secret Life of Walter Mitty)

quote: Don’t be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.
author: Eames (Inception)

quote: An idea is like a virus. Resilient. Highly contagious.
author: Cobb (Inception)

quote: You mustn’t be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.
author: Eames (Inception)

quote: All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us.
author: Gandalf (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring)

quote: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
author: Galadriel (The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring)

quote: There’s some good in this world, and it’s worth fighting for.
author: Samwise Gamgee (The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers)

quote: I can’t carry it for you, but I can carry you.
author: Samwise Gamgee (The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King)

quote: Deeds will not be less valiant because they are unpraised.
author: Aragorn (The Lord of the Rings)

quote: Don’t let anyone ever make you feel like you don’t deserve what you want.
author: Heath Ledger (10 Things I Hate About You)

quote: You’ve got the makings of greatness in you, but you gotta take the helm and chart your own course.
author: John Silver (Treasure Planet)

quote: The hardest choices require the strongest wills.
author: Thanos (Avengers: Infinity War)

quote: I can do this all day.
author: Steve Rogers (Captain America)

quote: Avengers, assemble!
author: Steve Rogers (Avengers: Endgame)

quote: We are Groot.
author: Groot (Guardians of the Galaxy)

quote: I am Iron Man.
author: Tony Stark (Avengers: Endgame)

quote: With great power comes great responsibility.
author: Uncle Ben (Spider-Man)

quote: Sometimes you gotta run before you can walk.
author: Tony Stark (Iron Man)

quote: You either die a hero, or live long enough to see yourself become the villain.
author: Harvey Dent (The Dark Knight)

quote: Dreams feel real while we’re in them. It’s only when we wake up that we realize something was strange.
author: Cobb (Inception)

quote: Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.
author: Red (The Shawshank Redemption)

quote: You’re only given a little spark of madness. You mustn’t lose it.
author: Robin Williams (Bicentennial Man)

quote: Life moves pretty fast. If you don’t stop and look around once in a while, you could miss it.
author: Ferris Bueller (Ferris Bueller’s Day Off)

quote: If you build it, he will come.
author: Shoeless Joe (Field of Dreams)

quote: There’s no place like home.
author: Dorothy (The Wizard of Oz)

quote: After all, tomorrow is another day.
author: Scarlett O’Hara (Gone With the Wind)

quote: Frankly, my dear, I don’t give a damn.
author: Rhett Butler (Gone With the Wind)

quote: May the Force be with you.
author: Han Solo (Star Wars: A New Hope)

quote: I feel the need—the need for speed!
author: Maverick (Top Gun)

quote: Every man dies, but not every man really lives.
author: William Wallace (Braveheart)

quote: Show me the money!
author: Rod Tidwell (Jerry Maguire)

quote: You had me at hello.
author: Dorothy Boyd (Jerry Maguire)

quote: Keep your friends close, but your enemies closer.
author: Michael Corleone (The Godfather Part II)

quote: Say hello to my little friend!
author: Tony Montana (Scarface)

quote: Great moments are born from great opportunity.
author: Herb Brooks (Miracle)

quote: You make your own luck.
author: Billy Zane (Titanic)

quote: Never let go.
author: Rose (Titanic)

quote: You jump, I jump.
author: Jack (Titanic)

quote: I’ll be back.
author: Terminator (The Terminator)

quote: Hasta la vista, baby.
author: Terminator (Terminator 2: Judgment Day)

quote: The future is not set. There is no fate but what we make for ourselves.
author: John Connor (Terminator 2: Judgment Day)

quote: Roads? Where we’re going, we don’t need roads.
author: Doc Brown (Back to the Future)

quote: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.
author: Johnny Castle (Dirty Dancing)

quote: You can’t handle the truth!
author: Col. Jessep (A Few Good Men)

quote: Houston, we have a problem.
author: Jim Lovell (Apollo 13)

quote: Failure is not an option.
author: Gene Kranz (Apollo 13)

quote: Keep moving forward.
author: Rocky Balboa (Rocky)

quote: It ain’t about how hard you hit. It’s about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
author: Rocky Balboa (Rocky Balboa)

quote: Going in one more round when you don’t think you can – that’s what makes all the difference.
author: Rocky Balboa (Rocky IV)

quote: Yo, Adrian! I did it!
author: Rocky Balboa (Rocky II)
